refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a Gaussian state with mean and covariance

listitem.para: Column vector (n x 1), mean of the Gaussian distribution
Matrix (n x n), covariance matrix (must be symmetric positive semi-definite)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: GaussianState creates a Gaussian state representation used in Kalman filtering and other Gaussian-based estimation algorithms. The state encapsulates both the estimated mean and the uncertainty (covariance) of the estimate.
The Gaussian state is fundamental to:

listitem.para: Kalman filter prediction and update operations
